text: LATAM Perú Flight 2213 was a scheduled domestic passenger flight from Lima to Juliaca in Peru. On 18 November 2022, the Airbus A320neo operating the flight collided with an airport fire engine on take off, killing two firefighters and injuring a third, who died of his injuries seven months later. All 102 passengers and crew survived the accident, although 40 people were injured, two seriously. The aircraft was damaged beyond repair and written off from the accident. ==References== Category:2022 disasters Category:2020s disasters in South America Category:2022 in Peru Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2022 Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in South America Category:Lima
title: LATAM Perú Flight 2213
